edu.bu.hw3.nn.layers

Class Dense

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.bu.hw3.nn.Module
      • edu.bu.hw3.nn.layers.Dense

  • public class Dense
extends Module
    A class that represents a Dense connection between two groups of artificial neurons (i.e. fully connected layer). This class represents the equation Z = X*W + b where W and b are Parameter matrices, and X is a batch of input examples.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Dense

        public Dense(int in_dim,
             int out_dim)
        The constructor. This constructor creates an initialized Parameter matrix W with dims (in_dim, out_dim) and matrix b with dims (1, out_dim). This constructor will use a new random number generate when initializing the values of these Parameters.
        Parameters:
        in_dim - The number of artificial neurons in the input group
        out_dim - the number of artifical neurons in the output group.

      • Dense

        public Dense(int in_dim,
             int out_dim,
             java.util.Random rng)
        The constructor. This constructor creates an initialized Parameter matrix W with dims (in_dim, out_dim) and matrix b with dims (1, out_dim). This constructor will use specified random number generator when initializing the values of these Parameters.
        Parameters:
        in_dim - The number of artificial neurons in the input group
        out_dim - the number of artifical neurons in the output group.
        rng - The random number generator object. If null, a new one will be created.

      • backwards

        public Matrix backwards(Matrix X,
                        Matrix dLoss_dModule)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        A method to calculate the total derivative dLoss_dX (i.e. the total derivative through this Module). This Module internally calculates dLoss_dW and dLoss_db and increments the gradients of those Parameters by those values. dLoss_dW = X.T * dLoss_dModule (matrix mult) dLoss_db = dLoss_dModule.sum(dim=0) dLoss_dX = dLoss_dModule * W.t (matrix mult)
        Specified by:
        backwards in class Module
        Parameters:
        X - the input Matrix
        dLoss_dModule - the total derivative up to this Module.
        Returns:
        The total derivative dLoss_dX
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getParameters

        public java.util.List<Parameter> getParameters()
        An abstract method to get a List of all Parameters contained within this Module.
        Specified by:
        getParameters in class Module
        Returns:
        the List of Parameter objects contained within this Module [W, b]
